posts.text: Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server 内容 Quick Start23 q 2 3 注意： 在ECMAScript 5的strict模式下，这种情况的this已经被规定不会指向全局对象了，而是undefined 1.sdfa1.1 sdfadf1.2 sdfadf2. galjbl1$ hexo new "My New Post" Header One Header Two Item One Item Two Do not just seek happiness for yourself. Seek happiness for all. Through kindness. Through mercy. David LevithanWide Awake 1[rectangle setX: 10 y: 10 width: 20 height: 20]; Array.map1array.map(callback[, thisArg]) .compactUnderscore.js12.compact([0, 1, false, 2, '', 3]);=> [1, 2, 3] pullquote content wuyaxiong

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
